ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(System__c, 'Mixed (LED + HPS, etc)'), RecordType.Name = 'Greenhouse', OR( ISBLANK(Wattage__c), ISBLANK(Qty_fixtures_per_truss__c), ISBLANK(Qty_HPS_per_truss__c)) ), TRUE, FALSE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Wattage, Qty fixtures per truss and Qty HPS per truss should not be blank when System is Mixed (LED + HPS, etc).
